entries.title: IBM's graphene-based circuitry could boost wireless communications
entries.content: Researchers at Big Blue improved graphene-based radio receiver performance by attaching the fragile form of carbon material at the end of the chipmaking process. Read this article by Stephen Shankland on CNET News.

entries.title: Five things I love about IBM Fiberlink MaaS360 - IBM Mobile
